text: Jonathon David Hardwick Jr. (September 21, 1963 - , 2023) was an American voice actor, comedian, writer and producer, who was known for the voice of Dale Gribble in King of the Hill. Hardwick was born on September 21, 1963 in Austin, Texas. He studied at Texas Tech University. Hardwick was found dead at his home in Austin on August 8, 2023 at the age of 64. Three months later, it was reported that his body was found badly decomposed and a cause of death could not be found. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Short film featuring Johnny Hardwick Category:1963 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Austin, Texas Category:American television producers Category:American movie producers Category:Actors from Austin, Texas Category:Writers from Austin, Texas
title: Johnny Hardwick
